DOC.brief_summary: Can participation group physical activity , community-based organize group walk , help adult diabetes patient develop physically active lifestyle ? Can engagement ultimately lead improvement hemoglobin A1c ? To address question , investigator design pilot study aim investigate effect community-based group walk among Joslin adult diabetes development physically active lifestyle glycemic level . The investigator hypothesize participation group walk event help Joslin adult diabetes engage physical activity improve glycemic control .
DOC.brief_title: Adopting Physically Active Lifestyle Through Organized Walk Events Among Joslin Clinic Patients
DOC.criteria: Joslin Clinic patient 18 year old A1C 7.5 % 12.0 % Received physician clearance indicate safe participate walk club event Reside within Boston Greater Boston Area Ability communicate English and/or Chinese Agree participate intervention walk club 6 consecutive week Pregnant breast feed Unstable angina myocardial infarction within 1 month prior screen Unstable gait , severe neuropathy , deformed foot . Enrolled another investigational study within 1 month prior screen study On medication prednisone affect blood glucose
